metaData.title: Rosia Montana | accommodation | hikes | bike | trails
metaData.text: Accommodation in a restored heritage house from the Historic Center. Hiking or bike trails along the roman galleries, gold mining areas, patrimony buildings, mountains, lakes. Rent bikes or guided tours. At the end of the day read a book from our library in the hammock. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania, Romania.

slides.title: Great place to visit - Rosia Montana
Casa Petri - an unique place in Rosia Montana

specificArticles.text:
Discover an unique cultural heritage built by various civilizations since antiquity to extract gold (proposed as UNESCO site)
See the existing open pits and how could impact a new one with cyanide like the one proposed by canadians.
Nature and serenity - all around us are massifs, lakes and protected natural areas great for hiking or cycling.

otherPages.text: We restored our grandparents house from the historic center of Roșia Montană, a house with a past (here was the place where the old miners changed the gold with money and dynamite) and we offer accommodation, guided tours and bikes. See here details, photos and reservations.

We want you to have an unique experience at Roșia Montană, we know our area, what can you doo and visit here, that's why we created some packages that includes accommodation, guided tours and/or different activities. See here these packages!
We are locals, we know our village stories, we visit and explore the soundings and sometimes we put here articles with unique experiences that you can also have while visiting our area. See here!

sections.text: How to reach us?

specificArticles.text: We are in the historic center of Roșia Montană, 331A, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania. To reach us set on gps 'Casa Petri Rosia Montana'. If you came by bus, the closest stations is in Gura Roșia (6 km), from here hitchhike or call us and we will come to pick you. Once in the historic center of Rosia Montana you will see on the left a 3 floor block of flats and in the back of you will see our house (one floor white house). The entrance is through the yard on the left of the house. If you came from Cluj-Napoca to Rosia by car see also
